meanings.definition: A tough, uncompromising, or intimidating person.
meanings.sent1: The biker gang leader was a real badass in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent2: She's known as a badass because she never backs down from a challenge.
meanings.sent3: The little dog thought he was a badass when he barked at the mailman.
meanings.sent4: Her boss was a total badass, always making sure things got done.
meanings.sent5: The wrestler's entrance was so badass, the crowd went wild.

meanings.sent1: That movie was so badass, I want to watch it again.
meanings.sent2: She did a badass job on her presentation and got a standing ovation.
meanings.sent3: The cake was so badass, everyone wanted the recipe.
meanings.sent4: His guitar solo was badass, it gave me chills.
meanings.sent5: The view from the top of the mountain was absolutely badass.
